extends Bullet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LaserBullet(float velocity, java.awt.Dimension hitbox, com.sun.opengl.util.texture.Texture sprite, java.awt.Dimension spriteSize, boolean lockAngle, boolean offScreenDelete)
      Uses an array of hitboxes, functions as a continuous trail of bullets, interpolates between the array to obtain a full hitbox
